| History                 = The Galloping Geese were a biker gang with a number of clubs, some of them on the West Coast. It had a 100 members in the various West Coast clubs alone. They were led by Wild Bill Gannon, who killed two while he was locked up. It was a well armed gang, equipped with automatic firearms and even a mortar. 

The gang's members on the West Coast launched an attack on their rivals, the [[Satan's Lords (Earth-616)|Satan's Lords]]. They decimated their operation in [[Arizona (State)|Arizona]]. Wild Bill Gannon and several of his men went looking for survivors and were ambushed by the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]]. They were later killed by the Punisher when he set the meth chemicals inside a hacienda to explode.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 31|32}}
